I would recommend "The Crucible" which is a historical drama set during the Salem witch trials in Massachusetts in the early 17th century. The movie tells the story of John Proctor, a wealthy businessman and prominent figure in the town of Salem. John Proctor is accused of being a witch by a group of townspeople led by Elizabeth Pynson. John Proctor refuses to confess to being a witch and instead becomes involved in a legal struggle against Elizabeth Pynson and the other townspeople who are accusing him of being a witch.
